title: Smash Lite Template
body: 'Smash Lite' is a digital services template built by [UIdeck](https://uideck.com/templates/smash/). It's a super clean (and free!) version of their [Smash HTML Template](https://uideck.com/templates/smash/). Featuring sticky header navigation (with smooth scrolls to page sections), a modern landing slideshow, a portfolio section with modal gallery, pricing table, testimonials, team member section, Google Maps integration and a contact form footer. Check out the [live demo](https://preview.uideck.com/items/smash/)!
